name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multi-Language Field Wizard for Power Apps

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This add-in helps manage multi-language support during column/field creation in Power Apps and Dynamics 365.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create multi-language fields effortlessly in Power Apps and Dynamics 365 with this powerful add-in. Select your additional languages, and input fields for the labels will automatically appear when creating fields in the Power Apps Maker Portal, streamlining the localization process directly within your workflow.
